personal.name: Kush Patel
personal.title: Data Scientist
personal.bio: A data science graduate student at Illinois Institute of Technology with a strong foundation in machine learning, statistical analysis, and data-driven decision-making.

hero.headline: I turn data into actionable insights
hero.description: Data science graduate student with expertise in machine learning, analytics, and web development. Passionate about solving problems using data and building intelligent, user-focused applications.

projects.title: Dashask: Auto-Grading Subjective Test Platform
projects.description: A system which allows teachers to add subjective questions in online examination which does not require students to use pen and paper and scan the pages occupying extra time which cuts out the time of the examination.

projects.title: KnowMeBetter
projects.description: A static web-portfolio generator which seamlessly integrates with your github account to showcase your portfolio to the entire world.

projects.title: Diabetes Prediction
projects.description: Built interpretable and reliable models for predicting diabetes using structured health data. We integrate multiple datasets â€” including the Diabetes Prediction Dataset from Kaggle, the Pima Indians Diabetes Dataset, and the LARS dataset â€” to explore key risk factors and develop robust machine learning models.

projects.title: Decentralised voting app
projects.description: A Decentralized Application (Dapp) running on the Ethereum blockchain and client side as a React JS application. All the contract code is written in solidity language which is used to deploy contract in blockchain platform. This application can be used by Election Commission (officials responsible for conducting Elections) as well as Voters

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects.
